mapper.select: SELECT BASE_GROUP_CD , BASE_GROUP_CD_NM , BASE_GROUP_CD_DESC , USE_YN_CD ,(SELECT BASE_CD_NM FROM TB_SYSTEM_COMMON_CODE B WHERE B.BASE_GROUP_CD='024' AND B.BASE_CD = A.USE_YN_CD) USE_YN_NM , REG_ID , REG_DATE , UPD_ID , UPD_DATE FROM TB_PROCESS_GROUP A ORDER BY BASE_GROUP_CD ASC

SELECT BASE_GROUP_CD , BASE_GROUP_CD_NM , BASE_GROUP_CD_DESC , USE_YN_CD ,(SELECT BASE_CD_NM FROM TB_SYSTEM_COMMON_CODE B WHERE B.BASE_GROUP_CD='024' AND B.BASE_CD = A.USE_YN_CD) USE_YN_NM , REG_ID , REG_DATE, UPD_ID , UPD_DATE FROM TB_PROCESS_GROUP A WHERE BASE_GROUP_CD=#{baseGroupCd}
SELECT ISNULL(RIGHT('000' + CAST( (CASE ISNUMERIC(MAX(BASE_GROUP_CD)) WHEN 1 THEN MAX(BASE_GROUP_CD) ELSE 0 END) +1 AS NVARCHAR),3), '001') BASE_GROUP_CD FROM TB_PROCESS_GROUP
